Name: Goldenjar Fall
About the game: Goldenjar Fall is an intense ARPG where the player will take the role of Korik the King of the Goldenjar clan, who will embark on a journey full of enemies and dangers that he will overcome using powerful ancient weapons and the skills granted by Thorgabart ! Key Features: • Explore dangerous dungeons as you defeat hordes of enemies. • Wield the power of the god of the dwarves separated into three different branches of powers. • Wield the weapons forged by the clan's master craftsmen.
Meta Title: Goldenjar Fall: Jul 8, 2021, Ardeal Studio and Full Overview
Meta Description: Looking for information on Goldenjar Fall? Check out the release date (Jul 8, 2021), developer insights from Ardeal Studio, and a complete game summary.
